definition: variant of 伙計|伙计[huo3 ji5]
companion/partner/group/classifier for groups of people/to combine/together
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: "Sure, buddy, " says the plebe, rooting around his pocket.
sentences.chinese: “當然，夥計”，新生說着，翻着自己的口袋。

sentences.english: "Well, what'll you give me for them?" asked the innkeeper's helper.
sentences.chinese: “給你這袋蘋果，你給我什麼呢？”酒館夥計問道。

sentences.english: Why, hello there, little fella. Didn't think I'd see you again.
sentences.chinese: 小夥計你怎麼在這裏？沒想到還能再看到你。

sentences.english: It's not that easy, buddy, not when people's lifestyles are at stake.
sentences.chinese: 沒那麼容易的，夥計，人類都是不見棺材不掉淚的。

sentences.english: Claire: You guys, you need to eat your brussel sprouts.
sentences.chinese: 夥計們，你們要把芽甘藍都喫掉。

sentences.english: Mr Dedalus said. I was only vamping, man.
sentences.chinese: 迪達勒斯先生說，“夥計，我不過是湊湊熱鬧。”

sentences.english: I'm sorry to ride you, pal.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉我又數落你了，夥計。

sentences.english: I inquired at the car rental desk. "Nope, just the one mate."
sentences.chinese: 我問租車店的夥計，“不，一個夠了。”

sentences.english: Hi guys, there is no pleasure without pain in the world.
sentences.chinese: 夥計，這個世界沒有無痛苦的快樂。

sentences.english: Shit , mate, you're lowering the flag.
Me hammer is always ready, lads.
sentences.chinese: 俺的戰錘隨時待命，夥計。

sentences.english: I'm afraid you're backed a loser there this time, old chap.
sentences.chinese: 老夥計，恐怕你的生意這次是無利可圖。

sentences.english: Oh guy, there is no free lunch.
sentences.chinese: 哦，夥計，世上沒有免費的午餐。

sentences.english: Come on, man, I'm running out of underwear.
sentences.chinese: 別鬧了，夥計，我已經沒有多餘的內衣褲了。

definition: master/qualified worker/respectful form of address for older men/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
to come over/to manage/to handle/to be able to take care of
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
